text_block_list.name: Sugar Lights
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for gathering here today. 
I would like to present to you the 
product of my latest research.

text_block_list.name: Sugar Lights
text_block_list.text:
This is the neuro-controlled robot, ST-2. 
No controller device is required to operate it. 
It'll be faster to show you ——

text_block_list.name: ST-2 (Satie)
text_block_list.text: …Phew. I've now successfully linked my consciousness with ST-2, allowing me to operate it.

text_block_list.name: ST-2 (Satie)
text_block_list.text:
As for what I can accomplish 
with this… anything is possible.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
———— Good. 
Its dancing… looks very natural.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Hee—h. So you can freely adjust its running characteristics. That makes it the perfect simulated opponent.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Aaahahaha! This can of tin ain't half bad! Still, the gods have not yet handed down their judgement! So battle on! Do not desist until the flute of endings sounds!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
…Well, it's great with a pan, but that's 
not very useful if it burns the food.

text_block_list.name: Sugar Lights
text_block_list.text:
This is my invention. 
And now, finally…

text_block_list.name: Sugar Lights
text_block_list.text:
…I can fulfil a uniquely 
personal dream of mine.
